name: PolyHedral
description:
!!Warning!! This game contains awesome colors and gnarly lights!! Its also has a trippy 2D-3D effect. So if your sensitive to these things play at your own risk.

Polyhedral is a Bullet Hell That Rocks. Survive in between shield packs and score as many points as you can. I did the graphics in Blender so there all Low Poly 3D.
Keyboard controls:
Use arrow key to move "S" to shoot
Game Controller:
Left analog stick to move "X" to shoot

Game Features:

  • Awesome gameplay
  • Low poly graphics made with Blender and music made with Yamaha keyboard.
  • Online high scores. (GameJolt) This version will work just have your username and gamer token redy
  • Four Online Trophys
  • Gamepad support


    • Latest News Updates
